definition: "silk" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 120), occurring in 红, 绿, 累 etc/also pr. [mi4]

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this
to be ready/to be in order
reign name of penultimate Qing emperor Guangxu or Guang-hsu (1875-1908)
plethora of things to tackle/multitude of loose ends/very complicated/chaotic
to be in a bad mood

sentences.english: All the threads within a process share the address space of that process.
sentences.chinese: 在處理序中的所有執行緒共用該處理序的位址空間。

sentences.english: She worked hard in order that everything would be ready by 6o'clock…
sentences.chinese: 她拼命幹活以便到六點時把一切都準備緒。

sentences.english: March breeze, blew a Hearts Chien Xu, 10,000 kinds of style sections to.
sentences.chinese: 三月的微風，吹得一片芳心千千緒，萬種風情款款來。

sentences.english: Discusses how to implement multithreading in your components.
sentences.chinese: 描述如何在元件中實作多執行緒。

sentences.english: Set the breakpoint inside the worker thread callback method.
sentences.chinese: 在背景工作執行緒回呼方法內設定中斷點。

definition: bosom/heart/mind/to think of/to harbor in one's mind/to conceive (a child)
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
this/this kind of/this sort of/this type of
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
